attributes.action: Revaluate decision on GCSE and A level examinations in 2021.
attributes.additional_details: Dispand A levels and GCSE's this year as even now geographical disparities are a problem because of local lockdowns.
attributes.background: The government should rethink their position on GCSE's and A levels in 2021, just as Wales have done. It is unfair to the masses of students in th UK who rely on teachers for support and have not had the sufficient advise or equipment to learn effectively.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
